title: #179: Profiling "Leaving Neverland"
description:
Laura Richards, Jim Clemente and Lisa Zambetti analyse Dan Reed’s documentary ‘Leaving Neverland’ and Wade Robson and Jimmy Safechuck’s account of child sexual victimization. 


Find out what Jim has to say about the FBI investigation into Michael Jackson. Health warning: this episode may be triggering. Please don’t stay silent in the face of abuse and violence. There are many specialist services that understand what you are going through and can help.

If you have experienced abuse and want further information or to talk with someone, please contact:

1 in 6

https://1in6.org/


Darkness to Light

https://www.d2l.org/


Rainn

https://www.rainn.org/articles/sexual-assault-men-and-boys


Survivor UK

https://www.survivorsuk.org/
